Verses: 1 dhaaveedhin Kumaaranum Isravelin Raajaavumaagiya Saalomonin Needhimozhigal:
2 ivaigalaal Gnaanaththaiyum Podhagaththaiyum Arindhu, Buththimadhigalai Unarndhu,
3 vivegam, Needhi, Niyaayam, Nidhaanam Enbavaigalaippatriya Ubadhesaththai Adaiyalaam.
4 ivaigal Pedhaigalukku Vinaavaiyum, Vaalibarukku Arivaiyum Vivegaththaiyum Kodukkum.
5 buththimaan Ivaigalaik Kettu, Arivil Theruvaan; Vivegi Nallaalosanaigalai Adaindhu;
6 needhimozhiyaiyum, Adhin Arththaththaiyum, Gnaanigalin Vaakkiyangalaiyum, Avargal Uraiththa Pudhaiporulgalaiyum Arindhukolvaan.
7 karththarukku Bayappadudhale Gnaanaththin Aarambam; Moodar Gnaanaththaiyum Podhagaththaiyum Asattaipannugiraargal.
8 en Magane, Un Thagappan Buththiyaik Kel, Un Thaayin Podhagaththaith Thallaadhe.
9 avaigal Un Sirasukku Alangaaramaana Mudiyum, Un Kazhuththukku Sarappaniyumaayirukkum.
10 en Magane, Paavigal Unakku Nayankaattinaalum Nee Sammadhiyaadhe.
11 engalode Vaa, Raththansindhumpadi Naam Padhivirundhu, Kutramatrirukkiravargalai Mugaandharamindrip Pidikkumpadi Oliththiruppom;
12 paadhaalam Vizhunguvadhupol Naam Avargalai Uyirode Vizhunguvom; Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargal Vizhungappaduvadhupol Avargalai Muzhumaiyum Vizhunguvom;
13 vilaiyuyarndha Sagalavidhap Porulgalaiyum Kandadaivom; Kollaip Porulinaal Nammudaiya Veedugalai Nirappuvom.
14 engalode Pangaaliyaayiru; Nammellaarukkum Ore Pai Irukkumendru Avargal Solvaargalaagil;
15 en Magane, Nee Avargalode Vazhinadavaamal, Un Kaalai Avargal Paadhaikku Vilakkuvaayaaga.
16 avargal Kaalgal Theenguseyya Odi, Raththansindhath Theevirikkiradhu.
17 evvagaiyaana Patchiyaanaalum Sari, Adhin Kangalukku Munbaaga Valaiyai Virippadhu Virudhaa.
18 ivargalo Thangal Raththaththirke Padhivirukkiraargal, Thangal Praananukke Oli Vaiththirukkiraargal.
19 porulaasaiyulla Ellaarudaiya Vazhiyum Idhuve; Idhu Thannaiyudaiyavargalin Uyirai Vaangum.
20 gnaanamaanadhu Veliye Nindru Kooppidugiradhu, Veedhigalil Saththamidugiradhu.
21 adhu Sandhadiyulla Therukkalin Sandhilum, Olimugavaasalilum Nindru Kooppittu, Pattanaththil Than Vaarththaigalai Vasaniththu Sollugiradhu:
22 pedhaigale, Neengal Pedhaimaiyai Virumbuvadhum, Nindhanaikkaarare, Neengal Nindhanaiyil Piriyappaduvadhum, Madhiyeenare, Neengal Gnaanaththai Veruppadhum, Edhuvaraikkum Irukkum.
23 en Kadindhukolludhalukkuth Thirumbungal; Idho, En Aaviyai Ungalukku Aruluven; En Vaarththaigalai Ungalukkuth Therivippen.
24 naan Kooppittum, Neengal Ketkamaattom Engireergal; Naan En Kaiyai Neettiyum Gavanikkiravan Oruvanum Illai.
25 en Aalosanaiyaiyellaam Neengal Thalli, En Kadindhukolludhalai Veruththeergal.
26 aagaiyaal, Naanum Ungal Aabaththukkaalaththil Nagaiththu, Neengal Bayappadunkaariyam Varumbodhu Aagadiyampannuven.
27 neengal Bayappadunkaariyam Pusalpol Varumbodhum, Aabaththu Sooraavalipol Ungalukku Neridumbodhum, Nerukkamum Idukkamum Ungalmel Varumbodhum, Aagadiyampannuven.
28 appozhudhu Avargal Ennai Nokkik Kooppiduvaargal; Naan Maruuththaravu Kodukkamaatten; Avargal Adhikaalaiyile Ennaith Theduvaargal, Ennaik Kaanamaattaargal.
29 avargal Arivai Veruththaargal, Karththarukku Bayappadudhalaith Therindhukollaamarponaargal.
30 en Aalosanaiyai Avargal Virumbavillai; En Kadindhukolludhalaiyellaam Asattaipanninaargal.
31 aagaiyaal Avargal Thangal Vazhiyin Palanaip Pusippaargal; Thangal Yosanaigalinaal Thirupthiyadaivaargal.
32 pedhaigalin Maarupaadu Avargalaik Kollum, Moodarin Nirvisaaram Avargalai Azhikkum.
33 enakku Sevikodukkiravan Evano, Avan Vikkinamindri Vaasampanni, Aabaththirku Bayappadaamal Amaidhiyaayiruppaan.
